titleStmt.title: His Highnesse Prince Ruperts raising of the siege at Newarke upon Trent, March 21. 1643. Written by an eye witnesse to a person of honour.
titleStmt.author: Eye witnesse to a person of honour.

notesStmt.note: In this edition line 3 of title ends: Newarke upon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
